## Décrets sans AP

## Recherche des données du décret 2008

Voyons si 2010 contient le contenu du décret de 2010.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(arrow)
library(geoarrow)
library(sf)

wdpa_mdg_2014 <- read_parquet("data/MDG_WDPA_Consolidated.parquet") |> 
  filter(data_year == 2014)

wdpa_mdg_2014 |> 
  st_drop_geometry() |> 
  group_by(STATUS_YR) |> 
  summarise(n = n()) |> 
  print(n=27)
```



```{r}

hist_sapm <- read_rds("data/sapm_evol_2001_2011.rds")

hist_sapm |> 
  st_drop_geometry() |> 
  group_by(YEAR) |> 
  summarise(n = n())

hist_sapm |> 
  st_drop_geometry() |> 
  mutate(phase = case_when(YEAR <= 2003 ~ "pre_Durban",
                           YEAR > 2003 & YEAR <= 2008 ~ "Decret 2008",
                           .default = "Autre")) |> 
  group_by(phase) |> 
  summarise(n = n())
```


```{r}
hist_sapm_2008 <- hist_sapm |> 
  filter(YEAR <= 2008)

hist_sapm_2008 |> 
  st_write("data/hist_sapm_2008.geojson")

hist_sapm |> 
  st_write("data/hist_sapm.geojson")
```

Recherche sur les historiques de pages Wikipedia



```{r}
sapm_2010 <- read_rds("data/sapm_2010.rds")

sapm_2010 |> 
  group_by(YEAR_IMPLE) |> 
  summarise(n = n())

sapm_2010 |> 
  filter(YEAR_IMPLE == "in 2008") |> 
  pluck("NOM")

split_class_clean |> 
  filter(year(date_txt) == 2008) |> 
  pluck("pa")
```
